author: Tyler Conway
title: Meyers Leonard on Playing Call of Duty over NBA 2K: 'I Play 2K in Real Life'
description: Meyers Leonard  has made his career in the game of basketball, but he has no interest in the virtual sport.    The  Miami Heat  center gave a succinct answer when asked why he's been playing Call of Duty over  NBA  2K during his quarantine downtime...
content:
Oscar Baldizon/Getty Images
Meyers Leonard has made his career in the game of basketball, but he has no interest in the virtual sport.
